description:
“Best news app on Smartphone” - Phone Life Mag 
“News Republic offers the cure for infobesity" – CNET
“If you like news, News Republic is for you!” – AppDictions

• ONE APP – ALL THE NEWS! 
• GET THE WHOLE STORY! 
• MAKE IT PERSONAL 
• NEWS ENCYCLOPEDIA IN YOUR POCKET

Join now the close to 300’000 regular users of News Republic!

- Find 1000s of top stories as they happen on Sport, Business, Technology, Celebrity and Entertainment from News Agencies.

- Browse the headlines AND read an entire story without having to link back to another newspaper's website.

- Catch all the breaking news and headlines now or choose to follow specific events or people and the app will search and organize all the relevant stories for you instantly. Never miss a story with your very own personalized news app.

- Read any news item and then share it with a friend by email, Twitter or Facebook with one simple click!

- Just read an article and want to find out more? With over 30 000 topics covered, you can search and reference related articles and themes to discover more on any topic in an instant.
